# Full-Stack App with React, Vite, Express, and Drizzle ORM

## Project Structure
- **Frontend**: React + TypeScript + Vite
- **Backend**: Express + TypeScript + Drizzle ORM
- **Database**: SQLite with migrations

## Setup Checklist
- [x] Create project structure and instructions
- [ ] Scaffold backend with Express and TypeScript
- [ ] Set up Drizzle ORM with SQLite
- [ ] Scaffold frontend with React and Vite
- [ ] Connect frontend and backend
- [ ] Install dependencies and test

## Development
- Backend runs on port 8084
- Frontend runs on port 5200 (Vite default)
- Frontend proxies API requests to backend
